name: AVARICE'S CLOCK
description:
AVARICE'S CLOCK is a game where you must collect stars to spawn enemies and kill enemies for points.  At first it seems simple, until you realize that your bullets can bite you in the back. If you refuse to shoot for 10 seconds, the game will force you to shoot.

Can you develop a strategy to maximize your score?

WASD to move.

Mouse to aim.

Click to shoot. (Bullets only hurt one enemy)

Hold Q and B then press P to reset your highscore.

All assets are made for this game by Divagated (except for the font, which was made by Divagated, but not for this game)
